name: Travelers (Ballo)
description:
Jump across space and time searching for resources to survive. This group of misfits find themselves trapped and without enough resources they can't escape.

Each jump comes with it's own risk, are you going to find enough resources for the day? Will you be caught? or worse are you going to even return?

This is a survival stealth game developed for Ludum dare 43, feedback is highly appreciated and welcomed. Sorry in advance for any bugs and hope you enjoy it.
